DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To compare efficacy safety misoprostol vaginal insert ( MVI ) labour induction use standard ( MVI-24 ) adjust ( MVI-10 ) criterion . Design : Non-interventional observational case control study . Setting : Tertiary-care academic centre Germany . Population : A cohort 138 pregnant woman ≥ 37/0 week undergo labour induction . Methods : Induction labour MVI consecutive series woman use standard ( MVI-24 , n = 69 ) adjust ( MVI-10 , n = 69 ) criterion . Main outcome measure : The primary outcome time induction delivery caesarean section rate . The secondary outcome include need additional measure induce labour , uterine tachysystole , tocolysis , fetal scalp blood testing , meconium-stained amniotic fluid , umbilical arterial pH , Apgar score .
DOC.brief_title: The Misoprostol Vaginal Insert Labour Induction
DOC.criteria: gynecologist 's indication induction inform consent ≥ 37 week gestation singleton pregnancies cephalic presentation cervical Bishop score < 5 prim reassure fetal heart rate know hypersensitivity prostaglandins uterine scar parity > 5 contraindication vaginal delivery cephalopelvic disproportion placenta praevia chorioamnionitis antepartum bleed unknown etiology cardiopulmonary , renal , hepatic maternal disease glaucoma fetal congenital abnormality
